segments.text: I notice the woman has no clue about the mess in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus on the plate is absolute, which is almost admirable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, I feel a bubbling frustration as the water hits the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is precariously perched on that stool, reaching for cookies as if it’s a game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a sense of disbelief at how oblivious she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands there, her arm reaching up as if she’s won a prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s such a funny sight, but I can’t shake off the worry for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks peaceful and serene, a stark contrast to the chaos indoors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how quickly things can go wrong in a single moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That water could cause someone to slip at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR
